Change log
==========

1.0 2011-11-10 Eric V. Smith
----------------------------
* Finalized API.
* Added tests for derived classes.

0.2 2011-11-10 Eric V. Smith
----------------------------
* Allow for classes with no __init__ method.
* Normalize test names.

0.1 2011-11-09 Eric V. Smith
----------------------------
* Initial release.
